readable.title: 2744705147_acd767d3eb
readable.content: A man and a woman in a brown room posing for the camera . A man in a striped shirt hugging a blond short-haired woman with a black apron on . A man in a striped shirt poses with a blond girl in a black apron . A man is standing next to a woman , with his arm around her waist . A man with glasses is standing next to a woman with blonde hair .
